TopicTitle: Wings poofing on approach and crashes during scene changes

Articles.Content:
Yea I've been playing the game A LOT over the past few days and I just tried loading my career after encountering the black loading screen problem, only to keep on encountering it upon attempting to load my career. Its really odd. (See edits at bottom)

That is only one problem; the game crashes A LOT (still nothing new) but I suspect its memory issues, since the game can only use 4gb till 64bit comes out. I have a plethora of crash logs but i wont upload them all unless someone wants me to. It crashes about 3+ times per day when playing a lot. Its then good for an hour or even many hours, but it still will eventually crash.

(ALSO im still getting wings randomly destroyed when on final approach and upon landing on runway, this was happening before adding mods and before 1.05 build xx18)

My mods:

KIS/KAS (installed but I have not been using it in 1.05; it its updated to 1.05)

Kerbal Alarm Clock (is 1.05v but apparently needs to be updated again, looking to find out how to transfer current alarms into the update)

Claws stock bug fixes 1.05

Atmosphere trajectories 1.05

Kerbal Engineer 1.05a (still needs an official update, this was a quick fix from the author)

 

Here is my persistent file for my career: https://www.dropbox.com/s/n09fmnup907fbxx/persistent.sfs?dl=0

I was also experiencing an odd issue shortly before the black loading screen hold happened. I returned to KSC to find landed parts and flags that were planted to mark an airplane approach wayyy out from where they were originally;

  2. https://www.dropbox.com/s/tx72e3qnpxyuu94/2015-12-09_00014.jpg?dl=0

 

 

EDIT: Alright so after restarting my computer, the black loading screen finally reaches an end and it looks like things are back to normal. But the other things I mentioned like random crashes during scene changes, and wings poofing on final approach are still very much real.

EDIT2: Alright so its not a clean bill actually, previously I just saw that it loaded to KSC and didnt do anything further and exited the game. Now going back to it thinking it was fixed, I time warped to my next Alarm, 1 day ahead, and clicked "jump to ship", and I encountered an eternal black "loading" screen in the background.
